name: min
description: Програма повинна знайти найменший елемент массиву b.
simplify_postcondition: (AND (FORALL (k) (IMPLIES (AND (<= 0 k) (< k n)) (>= (select B k) m))) (EXISTS (k) (AND (<= 0 k) (< k n) (EQ (select B k) m))))
simplify_loop_invariant: (AND (<= 1 i) (<= i n) (EQ b B) (FORALL (k) (IMPLIES (AND (<= 0 k) (< k i)) (>= (select B k) m))) (EXISTS (k) (AND (<= 0 k) (< k i) (EQ (select B k) m))))
